articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: YouTube’s ad blocking crackdown is facing a new challenge: privacy laws - The Verge
articles.description: YouTube is launching a “global effort” to crack down on ad blockers, but some privacy advocates in the European Union argue that it’s illegal.
articles.content:
